insertCarModel: INSERT INTO car_models (brand, model, yr, hp, nm, acc, maxSpeed, weight, traction, price) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s) ON CONFLICT (brand, model, yr) DO NOTHING
listCarModels: SELECT * FROM car_models ORDER BY price ASC
getCarModelByName: SELECT * FROM car_models WHERE brand ILIKE '%%s%' AND model ILIKE '%%s%' AND yr = %s LIMIT 1
